content.body: Holger Benl: I uploaded the terser prototype here: https://github.com/szuend/terser/tree/scopes. Keep in mind that this is rather nasty, just to get some scopes out of terser :) See `rebuild-bench.sh` on how to invoke terser so scopes information is included.
content.formatted_body: Holger Benl: I uploaded the terser prototype here: https://github.com/szuend/terser/tree/scopes. Keep in mind that this is rather nasty, just to get some scopes out of terser :) See rebuild-bench.sh on how to invoke terser so scopes information is included.
